data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yalin, Zhang, Lin, Lu, Kwon, Yong Jung (2013): Review of the Leafhopper Genus Macrosteles Fieber (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China. Zootaxa 3700 (3): 361-392, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3700.3.3
